data: One of the most depressing and languid of all objects is the aspect of an Italian city in the full noon of a hot summer’s day.
One of the most depressing and languid of all objects is the aspect of an Italian city in the full noon of a hot summer's day.
Lever, Charles James, 1806-1872; Browne, Hablot Knight, 1815-1882 [Illustrator]
